root.name: NYAN-TECH
root.description: NYAN-TECH is a puzzle platformer where players goal is simply to get a key and find an exit door. Unique factor here is that the controllers 4 trigger and 4 colored face buttons are used to trigger platforms. The harder difficulty levels (and especially the Expert levels) demanding multiple buttons to be pressed same time while jumping and dodging various spikes.Game is spread into 5 different difficulty stages, all containing 10 levels:TutorialEasyNormalHardExpert - this unlocked after beating the Hard levels. Expert level is "hidden" in the level selection screen, but can be accessed by pressing down after highlighting “Hard” level.NYAN-TECH is available for 80MS points from the Xbox Live Marketplace.
